short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SmartDocs Vault Chat application powered by Open AI and Chat GPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome Extension enables customers to incorporate chat widget while editing documents online. Once activated, the extension will show a Chat widget on the designated websites. On the SmartDocs Platform, administrators can control the availability of this Chat feature on specific sites. The SmartDocs Vault platform provides the ability to customize and train the chatbot to effectively respond to different interactions from website users through the chat widget, which is made possible by this Chrome extension.
